channel.title: Open Hearth Gaming Community
channel.description:
For anyone who's not on the Slack... Gauntlet Publishing and the former Gauntlet Gaming Community have officially parted ways. The new community is Open Hearth Gaming. My understanding is that the parting was amicable on both sides, but any parting is going to be painful.
[https://openhearthgaming.com/](https://openhearthgaming.com/)
Open Hearth Gaming is a direct successor. Please see that site for more details. If you're on the former Gauntlet Slack, it has been renamed Open Hearth Gaming and your membership should carry over.
[Posting as a community member: I'm not part of the leadership team on either Gauntlet Publishing or Open Hearth Gaming.]
